channel.title: Banner
channel.description: Similar in size to MITB's. Here's my prefs. Text: Zandorak Sub-text: If you can think of anything cool for a game sub text then that would be cool, if not then just don't put anything. Border?: I would like it to look professional but the game is a roman era game so you don't want it to look futuristic. Color scheme: Black and red are my favorite colors. If you find that doesn't fit what your planning that is fine. Style: Celtic please. Not too celtic though, just I like the style of the Z on Zelda

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Well we’re shooting for a morpg (I’m guessing you were talking about the massive part :P), we may just go to a rpg though.

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

It is a MMORPG in concept stage right now. I am not the greatest with Photoshop, nor do I have the time. The culture is about as advanced as the Roman’s were. That is what I mean by Roman era.

Read full topic

item.title: Banner
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Similar in size to MITB’s. Here’s my prefs.
Text: Zandorak
Sub-text: If you can think of anything cool for a game sub text then that would be cool, if not then just don’t put anything.
Border?: I would like it to look professional but the game is a roman era game so you don’t want it to look futuristic.
Color scheme: Black and red are my favorite colors. If you find that doesn’t fit what your planning that is fine.
Style: Celtic please. Not too celtic though, just I like the style of the Z on Zelda

Read full topic
